See also: durchsage and durchsäge

German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [ˈdʊʁçˌzaːɡə]
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Durch‧sa‧ge
  • Homophone: durchsage

Noun[edit]

Durchsage f (genitive Durchsage, plural Durchsagen)

  1. An announcement over loudspeakers or on the radio.
